alert.note: Alert for Accomack; Gloucester; James City; Mathews; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 10:14AM EST until January 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...or the Winter Weather Advisory, wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one to two inches along with rapidly falling temperatures to near freezing. For the Winter Storm Watch, snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of eastern and southeast Virginia. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 PM EST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday morning through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please call 5 1 1. For the latest road information in North Carolina, go to http://DriveNC.gov.

area.areaDesc: Accomack; Gloucester; James City; Mathews; Surry; Sussex
